summary: Frontend adds routed public pages with a shared header/footer, themed styling, seed data for News & Events, and a Contact form that calls a new backend submitInquiry method. Backend adds inquiry submission and admin-only inquiry listing, but does not meet stable persistence and inquiry record shape/ordering requirements; it also introduces additional access control/user profile features not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store contact form submissions (inquiries) in stable state and expose methods to create a new inquiry and list inquiries in reverse chronological order, with each inquiry including at least: id, createdAt timestamp, name, email, subject, message.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend inquiries are stored in a non-stable var array, inquiry records have no id and use `timestamp` instead of a createdAt field, and `getInquiries()` returns the array as-is (not reversed/newest-first).

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include required static image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend references the required filenames, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files added under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (some files are omitted due to limits), so their presence cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management endpoints (getCallerUserProfile/getUserProfile/saveCallerUserProfile) and associated UserProfile type.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for contact inquiries storage/listing; no user profile functionality is requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Access control/authorization mixin initialization and admin-token-based initialization via URL parameter (`caffeineAdminToken`) and `_initializeAccessControlWithSecret` call.
hallucinated_features.reason: No authorization system or secret-token initialization flow is requested for the college public site + inquiry submission features.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes external social media links/icons (Facebook/X/Instagram/LinkedIn).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement (though it may be acceptable, it is additional scope).
